classic.text: I met a traveller from an antique land,
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, traveller, from an antique land, who said, meeting, parchment sketch

classic.text: Who said—'Two vast and trunkless legs of stone
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, Two vast and trunkless legs of stone, desert, parchment sketch

classic.text: Stand in the desert. . . . Near them, on the sand,
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, Two vast and trunkless legs of stone, desert, parchment sketch

classic.text: Half sunk a shattered visage lies, whose frown,
classic.prompt: Half sunk in sand, shattered visage, parchment sketch, frown, wrinkled lip, sneer of cold command, desert

classic.text: And wrinkled lip, and sneer of cold command,
classic.prompt: Half sunk in sand, shattered visage, parchment sketch, frown, wrinkled lip, sneer of cold command, desert

classic.text: Tell that its sculptor well those passions read
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, two people, one an ancient sculptor, the other a cruel king sitting for him as a model, parchment sketch

classic.text: Which yet survive, stamped on these lifeless things,
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, Hand-Drawn, two people, one an ancient sculptor, the other a cruel king sitting for him as a model, parchment sketch

classic.text: The hand that mocked them, and the heart that fed;
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, two people, one a sculptor with chisel and awl, the other a marble statue of a king, parchment sketch

classic.text: And on the pedestal, these words appear:
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, pedestal, words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings; Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!', ancient lost language

classic.text: My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings;
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, pedestal, words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings; Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!', ancient lost language

classic.text: Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, pedestal, words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings; Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!', ancient lost language

classic.text: Nothing beside remains. Round the decay
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, Nothing beside remains, Round the decay of that colossal Wreck, boundless and bare, The lone and level sands stretch far away, desert, parchment sketch

classic.text: Of that colossal Wreck, boundless and bare
classic.prompt: Hand-Drawn, Nothing beside remains, Round the decay of that colossal Wreck, boundless and bare, The lone and level sands stretch far away, desert, parchment sketch

classic.text: The lone and level sands stretch far away.'
